title: Secondary Mathematics Competency Strengthening Program Using Facebook-Based Social Learning Networks

context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones and must adapt to a Facebook-based collaborative learning environment, aiming to enhance math problem-solving skills through real-time lectures and social interaction.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in solving complex mathematical problems through collaborative problem-solving with peers in Facebook groups
Maintain over 90% participation in online discussions by applying the five-stage extended e-moderation model (Access-Explore-Resources-Knowledge-Development)
Achieve over 75% completion rate for Facebook-based formative assessment tasks while demonstrating grade improvement through peer feedback incorporation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
